column4: so im goin rounf in circles and still dont have dvd burner working OR scsi emulation enabled.. all i've achieved is a headache

i want my dvd burner to work, simply put.. ive looked at all these sites saying i need to enable scsi emulation, so i tried that, now i just find a site that says with linux 2.6 you dont need scsi emulation
so im goin rounf in circles and still dont have dvd burner working OR scsi emulation enabled.. all i've achieved is a headache
i am able to view dvds with it, i just cant burn them
if you run 2.6, you dont want scsi emulation
do you have the dvd-cdrecord-whateveritis package installed?
i dont have anything in my db only cdrecord and cdrecord-doc
which may or may not be in ubuntu
did you try kicking it really hard?
those permissions dont even matter if you're root.
